name: 田方治
objective: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
schedule:
This course includes three major activities: introduction to e-Vision, self-design algorithm development, and practical problem solving.  The details of the content and schedule is simply listed as follows:
?　　Introduction to Course Content (Week 1)
?　　Introduction -- Hardware & Software of Computer Vision (Week 2) – Video
?　　Image Statistics (Week 3) – Mean, STD, Correlation, Projection, Histogram
?　　Segmentation (Week 3~4)– Thresholding methods (e-Vision) Mean, Iterative, Maximal Entropy, and Otsu methods – Lab I- Fuse Inspection
?　　Enhancement (Week 5~7)– Smoothing, Sharpening (Filters)
?　　Calibration (Week 7)– e-Vision and self design with calibration rule or paper
?　　Measurement (Week 8) – point, line, circle, rectangle gauge design – Lab II – Fuse Pin Measurement
?　　Roundness Measurement (Week 8~9)—MIC, MCC, MZC
?　　Morphology (Week 9~10) – Dilation, Erosion, Opening, Closing, Thinning and its applications
?　　Color Image (10~11)– Image threshold and Measurement – Lab III- Melf Inspection
?　　Labeling (Week 11~12) – Blob analysis (e-Vision) and self design
?　　Matching (11~13)—template and feature based, applications : stereovision —Stereo face
?　　Face Recognition (Week 14~15)
?　　Invariant Object Recognition (Week 15~16)
?　　Transformation (Week 17) -- Textile Inspection – Gabor filter, Fourier Transform
?　　Final Project Presentation (Week 18)
scorePolicy:
Lab I, II, III, IV　　　　　　　　　　45 %
Homework (statistics, transform, thresholding, gauging, blob, matching)　　　　30 %
Project (Programming 10%+ Presentation & Report 5%)　　　　 　　　　　　15%
Paper reading and presentation (Week 14, 15, 16, 17)　　　　 　　　　　　10%
Book reading (extra points)　　　　　　　　 　　5%
materials:
A: Image Engineering, Processing, Analysis, and Understanding, Zhang, Yu-Jin, Cengage Learning Asia Pte Ltd. 2009.
